content: {A小害羞}Living with you and seein' everything you do, no matter the outcome, I just can't help but want to applaud you.
info: NPC成长等级-1级演出-1010云果_云果

content: I think mah, it's important to express your feelings to your neighbors and friends, whether it's to congratulate or encourage. So, that's why I learned to <style=Highlight>clap</style>...
info: NPC成长等级-1级演出-1010云果_云果

content: Even though it's kinda embarrassing to express it this way, as long as you got the message, and you know where I'm comin' from, {A期待}then I'm glad~!
info: NPC成长等级-1级演出-1010云果_云果

content: {A拍手}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, did I startle you mah? This isn't me just puttin' my hands together. I'm clapping for you from the bottom of my heart!
